attributes.action: Bar elected Scottish MP's from sitting in the Westminster Parliment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As There is a discrepancy between English and Scottish laws, No Scottish Elected MP should be allowed to have any influence over the English constitution, and should be barred from sitting in the English Parliment.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
